page.title: 09A Mixed Farm.
page.content:
We visited one of the farms in the{Rotherwas area.}The farm is typical of farms in Herefordshire, being a traditional{mixed farm.
A variety of{poultry}is kept for meat and eggs , this being part of the farm's income.
Other livestock kept include{pigs}and {sheep}as well as a dairy herd of approximately 50{Friesian cattle. }
The recent milk quota cuts imposed by the E.E.C. have caused a lot of uncertainty among farmers. Perhaps the more traditional farms are more able to cope with the future uncertainty, because they do not have to rely on one particular crop or produce.
